TopicTitle: Taking inspiration from the Mars Rover

Articles.Content:
I decided that I was tired of my stages getting stuck in orbit around the Mun, cluttering up things.

So like the Mars mission, I created a ship that initially was directed on a collision course with the Mun, and then shortly after detached, and adjusted my trajectory for a 100x100km orbit

It worked perfectly

Better yet, the craft had plenty of fuel to lower me to a 10x10km orbit and return to Kerbin, successfully land AND have plenty of fuel left over.

I\'d bet my nickel you could do a Munar Landing/Kerbin return with it.

I should really get photos of the it all, but here\'s the craft file anyhow.

It requires MechJeb, that should be it.

Ironically, the entire point of this craft was the clutter the Mun with Vertical Stage Separaters lol
